Key Work Experience:  A Process  Lead and Technical Review Committee Member  @ Petronas  with over ( 23+) years of experience in 
carrying out the foll owing  functions : 
 
BEP/ ITT Documents  Review ; BFD, PFS, PEFS Preparation ; Material & Energy Balance ; Simulation (UNISIM, HYSYS, ProMax, Protreat); Freeze the 
Concept , Optimization of the concept, Heat integration (Recover energy) , Units (Inlet Separation;  Gas Treatment Units; SRU; Condensate 
Treatment Units; Technical Write -up; Support Cost Estimation;  Plot Plan; Equipment List; Utilities Summary; Electrical Load List; Process Data 
Sheet; Line Sizing (Process, BOP, Utilities etc); Pump Calculation, RFQ, Thermal Rating of the Heat Exchangers using HTRI ; Process Data Sheet 
Review ; Hydraulics calculation for the Single/Two Phase Flow lines  (Pipesim, TGNET, TLNET) ; Hydraulic verification of pump circuits; Flare  load 
summary, Equipment list and line list ; Calculation for safety valves  ; Design Review ; Participation in HAZOP ; Process Integration ; Technical Proposal 
Preparation ; Raise Technical Queries, Propose Alternatives, Participate Technical Clarification Meetings .  
Standards Exposure: Shell DEP, DEM,  API s tandards, ASME standards, International  Standards  
Advance Software Knowledge  : UNISIM,  HYSYS, ProMax, ProT reat, Flare Net, Shell FRED, TGNET , TLNET , Pipesim, HTRI , EDR .
